bug.author: leezu
bug.description:
After enabling cmake staticbuild for CD in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/apache/incubator-mxnet/commit/c329a524c520ec2b41aa4bff5ee113ff7221b790>c329a52</denchmark-link> , <denchmark-link:https://github.com/leezu/gluon-nlp/runs/669008929?check_suite_focus=true>https://github.com/leezu/gluon-nlp/runs/669008929?check_suite_focus=true</denchmark-link>
Need to change the staticbuild script to staticlink openblas or include the library.
